build.beforeDevCommand: sh -c 'if [ -f build_frontend.mjs ]; then node build_frontend.mjs; elif [ -f src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs ]; then node src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs; elif [ -f ../src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs ]; then node ../src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs; else echo "No build_frontend.mjs found; skipping frontend build"; fi'
build.beforeBuildCommand: sh -c 'if [ -f build_frontend.mjs ]; then node build_frontend.mjs; elif [ -f src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs ]; then node src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs; elif [ -f ../src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs ]; then node ../src-tauri/build_frontend.mjs; else echo "No build_frontend.mjs found; skipping frontend build"; fi'
